components.name: React Frontend
components.description: The user interface built with React, responsible for user interaction, data presentation, and form handling.

components.name: FastAPI Backend
components.description: The Python backend built with FastAPI, handling API requests, business logic, and communication with the database and AI services.

components.name: Repello AI Service
components.description: An AI service (likely integrated via API) providing threat intelligence and automated threat modeling suggestions.

components.name: PostgreSQL Database
components.description: Stores threat models, user data, and potentially threat intelligence data.

data_flows.description: User interactions (form submissions, data updates) are sent to the backend via API calls.
The backend sends threat modeling requests to the AI service for automated suggestions.
The AI service returns threat modeling suggestions to the backend.
Threat models and related data are persisted and retrieved from the database.

trust_boundaries.name: Frontend-Backend Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the React frontend and the FastAPI backend.  Sensitive data should not be directly exposed from the frontend.

trust_boundaries.name: AI Service Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The interaction between the FastAPI backend and the Repello AI Service.  Trust in the AI service's threat intelligence and suggestions is paramount.
